hadiths.text: It was narrated that Anas bin Malik said "the Messenger of Allah(ﷺ) said":"When any of the People of the Book greets you with Salam (peace), then say, Wa 'alaikum(and also upon you)

chapter.ara-name: باب رَدِّ السَّلاَمِ عَلَى أَهْلِ الذِّمَّةِ
chapter.eng-name: Returning (the greeting of) peace to Ahludh-Dhimmah(Non Muslim living under the protectio
